name: @ethossoftworks/outcome
description: An alternative approach to async/await error handling for TypeScript

scripts.build: yarn format && npx webpack --env prod && node scripts/post-build.js
scripts.test: yarn format && npx webpack --env test && node build/Outcome.test.js
scripts.test-inspect: yarn format && npx webpack --env test && node --inspect-brk build/Outcome.test.js
scripts.build-publish: yarn build && cd ./build && npm publish --access public
